find_buses_subtitle: Search KSRTC routes, timings, and connections instantly.
bus_directory_desc: Browse all connected destinations from Puttur KSRTC. Find routes, timings, and stops.
footer_tagline: A community-powered KSRTC route & timing platform for Puttur.
footer_open_source_desc: This project is open-source and built with passion.
footer_disclaimer_text: PutturBus is a non-commercial, community-driven student initiative built to help the people of Puttur access KSRTC bus information easily. This website is not affiliated with, operated by, or endorsed by KSRTC. Timings and routes are provided for public guidance only.
footer_independent_service: This is an independent public-information service. Data sourced from public schedules.
disclaimer_text: PutturBus is a public-service initiative built to help residents and travelers easily find KSRTC bus routes, timings, and connections from Puttur. This platform provides schedule-based guidance for convenience. For official bookings and live ticketing, please visit
help_hero_subtitle: Community-powered travel help for passengers from Puttur.
help_box_text: To support public transport and social welfare. No booking. No payment. Just guidance.
card_helpline_desc: KSRTC Depot and Bus Stand contact numbers for enquiries.
card_emergency_desc: Police, Ambulance, and Hospitals near Puttur.
card_faq_desc: Common doubts about tickets, luggage, and bus types.
card_travel_desc: How to use KSRTC services and how PutturBus works.
